snippet: Balitmore gave up three unearned runs in Monday’s loss to the Rays, and while they’ve already clinched a playoff spot, they now trail the Yankees in the American League East.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes while the Baltimore Orioles have secured spot in the playoffs, their recent 5-3 loss to the Tampa Bay Rays brought down their standing in the league.
lead_paragraph: Balitmore gave up three unearned runs in Monday’s loss to the Rays, and while they’ve already clinched a playoff spot, they now trail the Yankees in the American League East.

headline.seo: Loss to Rays Shrinks Orioles’ Margin for Errors
headline.main: Loss to Rays Shrinks Orioles’ Margin for Errors
headline.print_headline: Orioles’ Margin Of Error Shrinks In Loss to Rays
